Uses of Interface
core.IConfig

  • Packages that use IConfig 
    Package Description
    core
    Provides the classes necessary for core functions: Main, I/O (game data, logger, languages), ...
    events.logic
    Provides all logic events classes.
    events.logic.startState  
    gameview.sView
    Provides the classes necessary for the start state: Main menu, start new game, player configuration.
